Data Cleaning

import requests
import json
import re
import pandas as pd

I clean all the data here so I can begin to do analysis and try to build some useful models. I’ll start by reading in a csv, selecting some columns, and changing the column names.

economic2022=pd.read_csv('./data/2022DP05.csv')
economic2022=economic2022.reset_index(drop=True)

population_2020_URL='https://api.census.gov/data/2020/dec/dhc?get=group(P1)&for=county%20subdivision:*&in=state:51&in=county:*'
pop_response = requests.get(population_2020_URL)
pop_response = pop_response.json()
pop_df=pd.DataFrame(pop_response)
pop_df.head()
